verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <S%H8199><s%> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- in אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni my בְּתֻמִּ֣י <S%H8537><s%> be-tum-Mi in mine integrity הָלַ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-ti; for I have walked וּבַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh also in the LORD בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> ba-Tach-ti, I have trusted לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo without אֶמְעָֽד׃ <S%H4571><s%> 'em-'Ad. [therefore] I shall not slide

בְּחָנֵ֣נִי <S%H974><s%> be-cha-Ne-ni Examine יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD וְנַסֵּ֑נִי <S%H5254><s%> ve-nas-Se-ni; and prove; צְרֹופָה tze-ro-fah כצָרְפָ֖ה <S%H6884><s%> tza-re-Fah cast קכִלְיוֹתַ֣י <S%H3629><s%> chil-yo-Tai my reins וְלִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi. and my heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> Chas-de-cha For thy lovingkindness לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> le-Ne-ged about עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; [is] before mine eyes וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> ve-hit-hal-Lach-ti, and I have walked בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha. in thy truth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> Ya-shav-ti I have not sat עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with מְתֵי־ <S%H4962><s%> me-tei- persons שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> Shav; with vain וְעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> ve-'Im with נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים <S%H5956><s%> na-'a-la-Mim, with dissemblers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor אָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> a-Vo. neither will I go in

שָׂ֭נֵאתִי <S%H8130><s%> ne-ti I have hated קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> ke-Hal the congregation מְרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> me-re-'Im; of evil doers וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- with רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, with the wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo and I will not אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> 'e-Shev. and will not sit

אֶרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> 'er-Chatz I will wash בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <S%H5356><s%> be-nik-ka-Yon in innocency כַּפָּ֑י <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pai; mine hands וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה <S%H5437><s%> va-'a-soe-Vah so will I compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <S%H4196><s%> miz-ba-cha-Cha thine altar יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. O LORD

לַ֭שְׁמִעַ <S%H8085><s%> Lash-mi-a' That I may publish בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol with the voice תּוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> to-Dah; of thanksgiving וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> u-le-sap-Per, and tell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. of all thy wondrous works

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD אָ֭הַבְתִּי <S%H157><s%> 'A-hav-ti I have loved מְע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> me-'on the habitation בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha; of thy house וּ֝מְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> u-me-Kom, and the place מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan dwelleth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-De-cha. where thine honour

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <S%H622><s%> te-'e-Sof Gather עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with חַטָּאִ֣ים <S%H2400><s%> chat-ta-'Im with sinners נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; not my soul וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- with אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei men דָמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim with bloody חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai. nor my life

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whose בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> bi-dei-Hem In whose hands זִמָּ֑ה <S%H2154><s%> zim-Mah; [is] mischief וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand מָ֣לְאָה <S%H4390><s%> Mal-'ah is full שֹּֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> Sho-chad. of bribes

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> Va-'a-ni my בְּתֻמִּ֥י <S%H8537><s%> be-tum-Mi in mine integrity אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech, shall walk פְּדֵ֣נִי <S%H6299><s%> pe-De-ni redeem וְחָנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2603><s%> ve-chon-Ne-ni me and be merciful

רַ֭גְלִי <S%H7272><s%> Rag-li My foot עָֽמְדָ֣ה <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Dah standeth בְמִישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> ve-mi-Shor; in an even place בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים <S%H4721><s%> be-mak-he-Lim, in the congregations אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> 'a-va-Rech will I bless יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD
